text: Each notary public shall keep a fair record of all his official acts, except such as are mentioned in § 1-1210, and when required, shall give a certified copy of any record in his office to any person upon payment of the fees therefor.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 1-811.

1973 Ed., § 1-512.

DC CODE § 1-1211

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Record of official acts; certified copies.
